message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of great value to you.  While I can't disclose the exact details at this time, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me.  I'm offering it to you for $1500000.  I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair price, considering the potential value this product holds.  Please let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss the details further.
